Html:
Hello Radioman,

 

Can you add GeoServer Support for Next Release?

 

Regards

Azzahrah,

hello Radioman,

That i mean  we can use GeoServer as Map Provider,

Regards

Azzahrah
well just make another provider, copy/paste, change the url, thats it

Hello radioman,

Thanks for quick answer, i will try as you advice,

Regards,

Azzahrah

You can create a WMS provider as described in this topic: http://greatmaps.codeplex.com/discussions/278458
I use it to access maps from GeoSever.

Regards,
Orvindo

Hello orvindo,

 

i have tried, but too many error 

Error    7    The type or namespace name 'CoordinateSystemFactory' could not be found (are you missing a using directive or an assembly reference?)    E:\ftp\component\.NET\GreatMap\greatmaps-1.6 - Power\GMap.NET.Core\GMap.NET.MapProviders\GeoServer\WMSProviderBase.cs    51    17    GMap.NET.Core

this not exist,

using ProjNet.Converters;
using ProjNet.CoordinateSystems;
using ProjNet.CoordinateSystems.Transformations;

 

please guide me, how to use it,

 

Regards

Azzahrah.

You should add a reference to ProjNet.dll (http://projnet.codeplex.com/).

If you don't need coordinate conversions, the code referring to ProjNet can be removed.

Regards,
Orvindo
